detail_desc: T-shirt in soft cotton jersey.

prod_name: Luke low price s/l pj SB
detail_desc: Pyjamas in soft cotton jersey. T-shirt top with a print motif and shorts with an elasticated waist.
Leggings in stretch washed denim with an elasticated waist, fake front pockets and real back pockets.
5-pocket shorts in soft, stretch denim with an adjustable, elasticated waist (in sizes 8-12Y), a zip fly and button and raw-edge, frayed hems.
5-pocket slim-fit jeans in washed, superstretch, flexible denim for maximum mobility with an adjustable, elasticated waist, zip fly and narrow hems.
T-shirt in soft, printed cotton jersey with a ribbed neckline.
Long-sleeved jumper in a soft, fine, fluffy knit with ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Briefs in cotton jersey and lace with a low waist, lined gusset and cutaway coverage at the back.
Shorts in sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets and a back pocket. Soft brushed inside.
Lightly padded, fitted gilet with sturdy jersey sections, a stand-up collar, zip down the front and side pockets with a concealed zip. Lined.
5-pocket shorts in soft, stretch cotton denim with an adjustable, elasticated waist, zip fly and button and lace-trimmed hems with short slits in the sides.
Puff pants in a cotton weave with elastication and a frill trim at the waist and elasticated hems.
5-pocket ankle-length trousers in stretch twill with a regular waist, zip fly and button, and slim, straight legs.
Pleated satin skirt with a wrapover front, ties at one side and concealed buttons in the waistband. Lined.
Fitted, turtleneck top in mesh with long sleeves.
Short shorts in woven fabric with a high waist, pleats at the top, a zip fly with concealed hook-and-eye fasteners, discreet side pockets and wide legs.
Boxer briefs in soft, printed cotton jersey with an elasticated waist and lined gusset.
Long-sleeved dress in soft cotton jersey with a reversible sequin motif on the front (size 1½-3Y with normal sequins), seam at the waist and flared skirt.
Jacquard-knit socks in a cotton blend with elasticated, roll-edge tops.
Fitted, off-the-shoulder top in organic cotton jersey with long sleeves.
Sleeveless dress in a patterned cotton weave with a wide neckline, concealed press-studs down the back and a gathered seam at the waist with a decorative bow at the front. Unlined.
Maxi skirt in an airy weave made from a viscose blend with an elasticated drawstring waist and gently flared skirt with seams and gathers to add width. Unlined.
Jacket in soft faux fur with notch lapels, concealed press-studs down the front, and front pockets. Lined.

Boots in checked fabric with brogue-patterned details in imitation leather. Ankle-height shaft with a loop at the back and lacing at the front. Canvas linings and insoles and thermoplastic rubber (TPR) soles. Heel 3 cm.
Straight-cut top in airy jersey crêpe with a boat neck and short sleeves with pleated trims.
Maxi dress in soft, printed viscose jersey with narrow shoulder straps that cross at the back and a slit in one side.

Small, sturdy leather shoulder bag with suede details and a flap with a decorative detail and concealed magnetic catch. One inner compartment and a wide, adjustable shoulder strap with metal buttons. Lined. Size 5.5x14x20 cm.

ACE TEE x H&M. Top in scuba fabric with a jersey-lined hood, dropped shoulders and long wide sleeves with embroidery. Fabric belt with a plastic fastener at the waist and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Short, A-line skirt with a high waist and buttons down the front.
T-shirt in printed jersey.
Top in thin sweatshirt fabric with a jersey-lined hood and V-neck with lacing at the front. Low dropped shoulders, wide sleeves with ribbed cuffs and a ribbed hem.

Shirt in soft, lightweight premium cotton flannel with a cutaway collar and French front. Open chest pocket, yoke at the back, long sleeves with adjustable buttoning at the cuffs, and a rounded hem. Regular Fit – a classic fit with good room for movement and a gently shaped waist to create a comfortable, tailored silhouette.
Long-sleeved tops in printed cotton jersey with ribbing around the neckline and cuffs, and slits in the sides. Slightly longer at the back.

Blank Staples is a streetwear collection of minimalistic pieces that are the perfect canvas for your personal style and creativity. These pared-back joggers are made from heavy, 460 gsm cotton sweatshirt fabric for a premium handfeel. They have covered elastication at the waist and hems, jersey-lined pockets in the side seams and an open back pocket.
Felted coat with a small stand-up collar, concealed buttons down the front, discreet pockets in the side seams and a detachable tie belt at the waist. Recycled polyester lining.
Cropped top in crinkled jersey with narrow, tie-top shoulder straps. Concealed elastication and a small frill trim at the top with an overlocked edge, and wide smocking at the hem.

Sleeveless dress in airy, crinkled chiffon with beaded embroidery and a frill trim around the neckline. Opening with a button at the back of the neck and a narrow, detachable tie belt at the waist. Satin lining.
STUDIO COLLECTION. Polo-neck jumper knitted in a soft mohair blend with a turn-down, rib-knit collar, long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
V-neck knitted jumper with long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Socks in a soft, fine-knit cotton blend with a fold-down shaft and soft terry inside.
Jumper in a soft, rib knit with a polo neck and long sleeves.
Belt with two rows of metal eyelets and a metal buckle. Width 4 cm.
Fitted top in soft cotton jersey with a V-neck, gathered seam at the front and long sleeves.
Pool shoes with fabric straps, hook and loop fasteners and elasticated heel straps. Soft soles that are fluted underneath.
Hair elastic decorated with a large bow.

T-shirt in soft cotton jersey with ribbing around the neckline. Muscle Fit – a fit designed to showcase the body’s physique with narrow shoulders and tapered sleeves to create a flattering silhouette.
Sports shorts in sturdy jersey with taped details, an elasticated drawstring waist and side pockets.
Trunks in stretch cotton jersey with flatlock seams, short legs, an elasticated waist and a lined front.

Short-sleeved shirt in linen with a resort collar, French front and yoke at the back. Open chest pocket, short slits in the sides and a straight-cut hem. Regular Fit – a classic fit with good room for movement and a gently tapered waist to create a comfortable, tailored silhouette.

Padded mittens in windproof, water-repellent functional fabric with folded seams, elastication at the wrists and a hook and loop fastening at the top. Size 2-6M with no thumbs. Soft fleece lining.The mittens have a water-repellent coating without fluorocarbons.
Short-sleeved polo shirt in cotton piqué with a ribbed collar, button placket, small embroidery detail on the chest and short slits in the sides. Slightly longer at the back.
Dog jumper in a soft knit with a polo neck, ribbing around the front legs and an opening for the back legs.
Strapless swimsuit with a wide flounce at the top, narrow detachable straps that can be tied at the back of the neck, and a silicone trim at the top.
Long-sleeved cardigan in soft cotton jersey with a V-neck, narrow ties at the front and overlocked edges at the cuffs and hem.
T-shirt in cotton jersey with a print motif.
T-shirt in linen jersey with a boat neck, lapped shoulders and slits in the sides of the hem.
Imitation leather sandals with braided detailing at the front and an adjustable ankle strap with a hook and loop fastening. Imitation leather insoles and rubber soles.

Long blouse in a softly draping weave with a sheen. Collar, concealed buttons down the front and a detachable tie belt at the waist. Yoke with a pleat at the back, long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back. Unlined.
Swimsuit with a decorative bow on the shoulder straps and a lined gusset.
Jeans in washed, stretch denim with a regular waist and zip fly and button. Fake front pockets, real back pockets and skinny legs.

Short dress in an airy viscose weave with a collar, buttons down the front, gently dropped shoulders and long sleeves with a tab and button. Gathered seam at the waist and a wide, softly draping skirt. Unlined.
Chelsea boots with elastic gores in the sides and a loop front and back. Cotton canvas linings and insoles. Heel 2 cm. The polyester content of the boots is partly recycled.
Patterned swimsuit with a frill around the neckline that continues over the shoulder straps, and a decorative bow at the back.
Captain’s cap with a band at the front. Lined.
Maxi dress in a viscose weave with narrow, tie-top shoulder straps, a smocked bodice with a small frill trim at the top and tiers to the hem. Unlined.

Baby Exclusive. Sleeveless blouse in an organic cotton weave with broderie anglaise. Buttons at the front, a small flounce at the shoulders, a gently gathered yoke and a scalloped hem. Lined in a cotton weave.
Microfibre and lace Brazilian briefs with a low waist, lined gusset, wide sides and half-string back.
Sunglasses case in scuba fabric with a raised motif. Opening at one short end. Size 9x18.5 cm.
Cardigan in fine-knit cotton with a round neck, long sleeves and buttons down the front. Ribbing at the cuffs and hem and short slits in the sides.
Long-sleeved top in soft sweatshirt fabric with embroidery on the front and sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Brushed inside.
Wide blouse in an airy, patterned viscose weave with a V-neck and buttons down the front. Wide, elbow-length raglan sleeves, buttoned cuffs and a rounded hem. Longer at the back.
Sleeveless dress in lace with a small opening and button at the back of the neck, a gathered seam at the waist and a flared skirt with a grosgrain bow at the sides. Soft jersey lining.

Suit trousers in a textured weave with an adjustable elasticated waist, extended waistband with a concealed button, and zip fly with a hook-and-eye fastening. Side pockets and jetted back pockets with a button.
Bootees in organic cotton with elastication around the opening and an embroidered motif on the front.
Metal hoop earrings decorated with plastic beads and metal shells. Diameter 2.5 cm, length 9.5 cm.
Shorts in a cotton weave with an elasticated waist with a decorative bow, and side pockets.
Shirt in washed denim with worn details. Collar, flap chest pockets with a button and long sleeves with buttoned cuffs.
Top in soft sweatshirt fabric with a motif and ribbing with an overlocked edge at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Joggers in soft sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist, patch side pockets and tapered legs with elasticated hems.
Thin metal rings in various designs.
